text:
Aleksandr Borisovich Nikitin (; 4 February 1961 – 14 January 2021) was a Russian professional football coach and player. He was born in Stalingrad, Russia. He was known for playing and managing Rotor Volgograd. His playing career lasted from 1978 to 1993. His managing career lasted from 1997 to 2009.
Nikitin died on 14 January 2021 in Volgograd at the age of 59.
